--- select_tablesample_with_subquery.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  (SELECT * FROM Singers) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:    11,
      Source: &parser.SubQueryTableExpr{
        pos:   18,
        end:   76,
        Query: &parser.Select{
          pos:      19,
          Distinct: false,
          AsStruct: false,
          Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
            &parser.Star{
              pos: 26,
            },
          },
          From: &parser.From{
            pos:    28,
            Source: &parser.TableName{
              Table: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  33,
                end:  40,
                Name: "Singers",
              },
              Hint:   (*parser.Hint)(nil),
              As:     (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
              Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
            },
          },
          Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
          GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
          Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
          OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
          Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
        },
        As:     (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: &parser.TableSample{
          pos:    42,
          Method: "BERNOULLI",
          Size:   &parser.TableSampleSize{
            pos:   64,
            end:   76,
            Value: &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   65,
              end:   67,
              Base:  10,
              Value: "90",
            },
            Unit: "PERCENT",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM Singers) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)
